description: Try our easy to follow Orecchiette With Mixed Greens & Goat Cheese recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Zucchini,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Orecchiette With Mixed Greens & Goat Cheese Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 lemon, finely grated rind and 1/4 cup juice

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a large saucepan of boiling, salted water until al dente. Drain, return to pan and keep warm.

Heat butter and oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add onion and zucchini and cook for 4 minutes or until softened. Combine cream and cornflour in a jug. Add to pan with peas, lemon rind and juice, and bring to a simmer. Add spinach and cook for 2 minutes or until just wilted.
Add sauce to pasta and toss well to combine. Top with cheese and season with cracked black pepper.
